The Persona identifies the user type and defines the information that is available to this user. As "customer" persona, you have view access to your own account information and system data.

dlentry.dd: A user who is an “Admin” type, has view access to the system data of all customers. These users are typically company personnel.

A user who is of an "OEM" type belongs to a special type of customer. This customer is typically an HGST partner, for example a service provider or reseller. The partner provides ActiveScale CM to its own customers. This type of user has view access to the account system data and to the system data of all his/her customers.
A user who is a "Customer" type has view access to the system data of its own account.
